name: Chocolate Pudding Pops
description: Satisfy your chocolate craving with a quick, delicious, healthy treat. You’re never too grown up for delightfully fudgy goodness!
preparation: Prepare Chocolate Pudding according to package directions. Chill for only 5 minutes to let the bubbles settle.
Pour into Penguin Pal Ice Pop Molds and freeze for 4 hours.
tips: Flavour Changers:  Nut Butter Parfait: Add 2 tbsp of your favourite nut butter. Roll in chopped nuts after freezing.  Banana Split: Add 1⁄2 cup chopped banana and 1⁄4 cup chopped peanuts  Chocolate Berry: Fold in 1 cup berries  Irish Cream: Add 3 tbsp Bailey’s Irish Cream  Mocha: Replace 1 cupmilk with 1 cup chilled coffee  Black Forest: Add 1⁄4 tsp almond extract, 2 tbsp Kahlua or other coffee flavoured liqueur, and 1⁄2 cup pitted cherries.
